verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In his latest attack on the Russia investigation] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] , " [ARG1: The appointment of the Special Counsel is totally UNCONSTITUTIONAL] ! " This amounts to Trump 's opinion , and is a matter of debate among constitutional scholars .
